original_title: Music for Every Occasion: The Story of the DePue Family Musicians
overview: As the sons grow older, will the dreams of the father become their own? Will early encouragement translate into a lifetime of inspiration? Can the love of music fill the void of personal tragedy? A family grows up on and off stage, the story of the DePue Family Musicians.
title: Music for Every Occasion: The Story of the DePue Family Musicians
